title: This pizza place refused to deliver a pizza as ordered, and it’s reigniting the pineapple debate
text:
This pizza place refused to deliver a pizza as ordered, and it’s reigniting the pineapple debate For whatever reason, pineapple on pizza is a pretty polarizing topic. It seems like one of those things that people should be able to peacefully disagree on, but when it comes to this topping, temperatures start to rise.
A couple of weeks ago, Twitter got into a pretty intense discussion after the President of Iceland took a hard stance on the pizza topping . But, despite pineapple being America’s 8th favorite topping , it’s come under fire once again. 
This time, you can thank one Twitter user’s pizza place for bringing the fight to the forefront after they refused to deliver her pizza as ordered. 
I ORDERED A PIZZA WITH PINEAPPLE AND pic.twitter.com/VkmdaHYBwe 
— ali (@Try2ShootUsDown) March 5, 2017 “Couldn’t bring myself to put pineapple on it,” the cook wrote on the inside of the box, taping five dollars next to his message. “That’s gross. Sorry.”
We just have one thing to say. 

But Twitter has a lot more to share on the subject. 
this is getting out of hand. pineapple pizza haters are terrorizing innocent individuals! https://t.co/q0k9hqh11N 
— Richey Collazo (@RicheyCollazo) March 5, 2017 i'd have sued https://t.co/N7fXLMDHnL 
— al (@detectiveswyer) March 5, 2017 And some are standing up for the pizza place. Not all heroes wear capes https://t.co/1ZcmXcxj9B 
— astro boy (@CannibalActual) March 5, 2017 This is a thing of beauty. RESIST!!! https://t.co/2DggsSTqsr 
— F. Paul Wilson (@fpaulwilson) March 5, 2017 They did you a favor. https://t.co/E6JZkmrQJQ 
— Chihiro Ogino (@WickedBeaute) March 5, 2017 Others don’t understand why we can’t all just band together. @Try2ShootUsDown yo even though I hate pineapple on pizza, call and complain get that free pizza honey 
— katie (@ROSESMAHONE) March 5, 2017 @Try2ShootUsDown what's with all the hatred against pineapples 
— levi en rose (@leviathism) March 5, 2017 Dont know why there's a feud over pineapple on pizza when there are ppl out there who order chicken wings with sauce on the side like wyd???
— Devoncé (@devinmartin96) March 4, 2017 
Look, we don’t care whether you put tropical fruit on your pizza or prefer it fruit-free entirely. But infringing on someone else’s right to pineapple pizza? Now that’s just a step too far. 
wuss poppin twitter, retweet to ruin a pineapple on pizza haters timeline pic.twitter.com/cQvOkB7Wyl 
— nuevo guacc (@OriginalSDM) January 29, 2017 At the very least, we can all agree that pineapple pizza is better than this nonsense, right?
wuss poppin twitter, retweet to ruin people's timelines & to start WW3 pic.twitter.com/ah9ktTB2ii 
— nuevo guacc (@OriginalSDM) February 12, 2017 Yikes.
